column5: What, you couldn't figure out who was going to qualify 2nd and 4th.  What a bum  Joey
Really?? I didn't know that.
Ya got to read the rules...Just kidding,I got burned that way 2 years ago.Thats why it has a */9 next to the name.Hope evryone sees this cause it will bite you in the butt later in the year. Joe

Yes only 9 times all year including the chase. last year I saved myself enough guys in the A group to have front runners in every race.  That's why I didn't have Bush today I've already used him 3 times.  You figure with 36 races you will use up 4 guys in group C.  That is why it can get very interesting in the end, your roster becomes somewhat limited.
Hmmm, very interesting.  Thanks for that little tidbit of info.  I'll have to choose more carefully from now on.  Thanks  Joey

Does this only apply to your final selection? Or your final two selections .... lets say tier 1. Lets say I picked Stewart and Gordon on Thursday in tier one. Then on Sunday I settled for Stewart. Does my Gordon pick count as one of my 9 selections, even though I picked Stewart for the race?
Just the ones that you choose for race day count against you.In your example only Tony count. Joe
Thanks Joe. I should be good. The only picks that I've wasted have been on Stewart, and I'm comfortable with that.

Unreal top 3 separated by 16 points, that's like 8 positions on the track. That's like a little more then a 1.5 per race average. The way this is going we're going to have our own chase, LOL right now top 7 only 100 points apart.
Dont forget to get your picks in.Another COT race and another short track...Good luck.If you want to see the best racing in NASCAR the trucks roll Saturday at 3:00 on Fox.Go Johnny B!!! Joe
How did everyone do?Not too bad of a race today,was surprised to see 24 and 48 run that well.I didn't pick either of them. Joe
I'm up another spot     I'm trying to figure this only picking one person 9 times out tho. Going to have to start being careful.  Joey
ahh yes  Hendricks is cleaning up
Thank-you, thank-you very much. I'd like to thank all the little people that helped get me here...
Ya, you kicked butt this time Slowpoke.  Joey

It made listening to the race at work quite enjoyable (WGR AM 550). At one point it was Jimmy Johnson and my 4 drivers in 2nd to 5th place... (Johnson, Gordon, Hamlin, Busch, Yeley)... now that would have been a week to remember!  -Brian

Okay, I have a question.  Now that I know we can only pick a driver nine times, I want to know how many times I have picked some drivers.  I read the rules and it says at the bottom "The number of races each player has started for you will be listed along with all of his other stats. "  I can't seem to find this part, can someone clue me in as to where to look.  Thanks  Joey

Joey, when you pick your drivers you will see in the first column beside thier name how many times you have used them in a race... when you are viewing your team it will be the second column to the right of the 'active driver' check box.  Look for 0/9 or 1/9 etc. -Brian
Thanks Brian.  Joey
So does this mean that you can only pick Smoke 3 more times this year??   :clapping:

Joey,save smoke for the latter part of the year,he will be there then.You have to be careful not to burn out your 3 tier guys too cause some dont make all of the races.The road courses are a time to make up some big points cause the talent in the 3 teir is some of the best,Fellows and Said (if he is in 3rd tier)come to mind.Dont go with your heart,thats how the JR fans lose in this game,go with the drivers strengths even if you have to pick Robby Gordon on a road course or that asshat Biffle.Good luck... Joe
Get your team set before the deadline.No stinkin COT and a cookie cutter track.The usual suspects on these tracks will do..coug cough hendricks cough cough gibbs cough cough.Good luck Joe
hiccup michael belch waltrip hiccup
I'm feeling a little ripped off for Q points because of the weather... I guess Yahoo isn't giving out the points. My guy's Q'd 1, 3, 5, 6, 7, 8, 14, 18... hmmm decisions.

That last caution killed me if that race ended with 5 to go I would of had guys in 1-4-7-39th but ended up in 3-13-14-39th instead. That's like losing 36 pts in a flash. There is going to be a lot in the high 200's this week but I don't think anyone will break the 300 mark so it's still a tight race.  Gota love Bristol but Kyle said it best, the car of tomorrow sucks.
But I did have Kyle. Since he's in the second tier, Ill be picking him every week.   You got to pace yourself,you can only pick him 9 times and then you cant use him anymore. Joe

Original thread "No fantasy auto racing this year?, Sign up info here" by Trophymuskie. I thought I'd post some specifics in the topic title to avoid confusion with the fans of johnny benson sign-up thread.  Sign up here:  http://racing.fantasysports.yahoo.com/ -Click on "Create or Join Group" button -Click on "Join Existing Group" -Click on "Join A Private Group" -Enter Group ID#:  39168  (not the group name) -Enter Password: OFC -Click on "Continue"  The rest is well explained on the site for picking your team of drivers
We have five teams so far...  Trophy Muskie Chasers SlowPoke Motorhead Pigeons Speed Freaks DansWildCats  Dan has taken an early lead in trash-talkin'
Who moi?
Hey thanks slowpoke, we're at 7 now so I guess only 5 more and we'll have a good league.
i'm in it to win it..... but i'm used to being disappointed

Okay, we're up to 10 teams now!!!  Walleyejigger came out of nowhere to snatch the trash talkin' lead from Dan with this pass in the grass... "sorry but... get ready to suck my tailpipe" Pace yourself WJ, it's a long season... you don't want to run outta one liners before the 3rd race! I'm saving my best trash talkin' for when it counts!!  Sign up now to and offer up some of your own trash!!!!  -Brian
Wow I see we have 11 registered. This is going to be a lot of fun.  And guys you need to get used to seeing that same team on top of the standings.
you are right!!  after today it's gonna be the buckeye bass kicker on top the leader board all season.
Lap 1 is complete... my team is in the lead. Watch for lap by lap updates!! j/k Good luck folks!  -Brian
ugh oh, some people took a big hit with smoke and busch!!  glad i have dial-up and couldnt switch to tony in time this afternoon.
So when do we see any results?

Ohhhh did I take a beating with Stewart... glad I had Martin in my B Pool!!! Yay Joey!!
I'm already in one Yahoo league,is it possible to join two?BTW Tony killed me also. Joe edit to read,I figgered it out so I'm in! Joe
I will join as soon as I have enough time to do more then read 1 post man its hard to get time for my self these last couple weeks and when I do I really need the time o nthe hard water.
Im in also musky maddness motorsports
good deal, glad to have the rest of you in the league, dont worry about catching up to me, after my teams poor performance you shouldnt have any trouble. lol  but hey there's always next week.

God I've got Boris said and Jarret LOL I guess at least Jarret is starting. And I'm sure I would of had Gordon for California.
I also have the same line up...DANG.  Fortunately, i know no different.  Go whoever the heck I picked!!!
